#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
    long long int T,N,n,count,i;
    scanf("%lld",&T);
    for(i=0;i<T;i++)
    {
        N=100000;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        count=0;
        while(N>=n)
        {
            count++;
            N=N-n;
        }
        printf("%lld litres will last for %lld weeks\n",n,count);
        
    }
    
    
    
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
